title: Who's Going To Win Worlds?
body:
Who's your pick?

I'm personally rooting for Edward Gaming!

Not all teams fit in the poll so...

replies.body: LGD is my main pick for worlds. But I would love to see Clound 9 do well!
I'm with my main man Maraudaur here, it's the year of the Imp! LGD Hype!
I'm clicking the invisible Invictus Gaming but it won't register the vote >_<

That was my problem too man!

We're so similar ^_^
Wow. I feel like I'm seeing double here! {{champion:7}} {{champion:7}}
yea im on the Cloud 9 hype rn!

It will be fun to see if AHQ wins the world (as the TPA won S2), not just that the team is so dominate in the LMS and also that's the only Chinese Team (let's not discuss TW is not part of China here) which in the worlds are only consists of Chinese pro player (unless FW is using NL as their ADC not Kkramer).

The LPL's level is way above the other reign, but I think LGD has a better chance than EDG this year as their support PYL is probably THE BEST Support at the moment. so they really deserve a world champion title, but that's not fun to watch, I like the darkhorse fantasy story (not the team darkhorse). so let's hope AHQ can win this year.
It's honestly going to be so lame if Korea wins again, China is way overdue for a win for how strong their region is.
But with that said a lot of the Chinese teams are half Korean imports?
I don't mind honestly. While any Korean is playing for EDG they are representing China and giving it their all for that region.
